name: Pixel Soldier
description:
For better performance and gamepad support, download the desktop version below. (Web version will perform best using Chrome).

Leave a comment and tell us what you think!

Fight waves of enemies and face brutal bosses. Fractions of seconds will decide between survival and failure. Do you have what it takes?

This is an updated version of the #GBJAM5 submission. The original version made for #GBJAM5 can still be downloaded below.

Color Palette: #3d0705, #2b828f, #bbbc60, #dddcf2 (via http://www.pixelfor.me/crc/)

Special thanks to Vlambeer's talk "The Art of Screenshake" for teaching me how to create games that feel right.
